com.wingfoot.registry
Class Registry

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.wingfoot.registry.Registry
public final class Registry
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the ability to publish, discover and use services.

Given a Java object, that has to be exposed as a service, the methods in the Registry is able to publish the WSDL to a given Parvus server.

Given a WSDL and the Interface stub, the methods in the Registry is able to send SOAP messages (use the service) and return back the response as primitive types or Java objects.

In future, methods in the Registry will be able to discover services in a UDDI registry.

Method Detail

publish

public static java.lang.String publish(java.lang.Class classToConvert,
                                       java.lang.String publishLocation,
                                       Options options)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       SchemaException,
                                       WSDLException,
                                       RegistryException,
                                       java.lang.Exception
Publishes a WSDL to a Parvus server. Takes a classToConvert and converts it to a WSDL. The converted WSDL is then sent to the Parvus server.

Parameters:
classtoConvert - the class to publish as a WSDL
publishLocation - the URL of the Parvus server where ths WSDL is published
options - the options object encapsulating the options to be used in the generation of the WSDL
Returns:
String message from the server
Throws:
SchemaException - is thrown while processing the schema.
WSDLException - is thrown if an error occurs while generating the WSDL
RegistryException - is thrown if an error occurs with the Registry
java.lang.Exception - is thrown for general errors

publish

public static java.lang.String publish(java.lang.Class classToConvert,
                                       Options options)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       SchemaException,
                                       WSDLException,
                                       RegistryException,
                                       java.lang.Exception
Publishes WSDL to the local file system. The options object encapsulates user options, mainly package to namespace mappings. This publish method returns void because the file is be written to disk.
Parameters:
classtoConvert - The class to convert to WSDL representation
options - The user encapsulated options
Returns:
String A simple return message stating: PUBLISHED
Throws:
SchemaException - is thrown if an error occurs in a schema method
WSDLException - is thrown if an error occurs while generating the WSDL
RegistryException - is thrown if an error occurs with the Registry
java.lang.Exception - is thrown for general errors

bind

public static java.lang.Object bind(ProxyMap proxyMap)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    SchemaException,
                                    WSDLException,
                                    RegistryException,
                                    java.lang.Exception
Takes an interface class and returns an Object that is an implementation of the interface class. The interface is the Remote object that has a method for each operation in the WSDL.
Parameters:
proxyMap - proxyMap encapsulates all the necessary fields needed to dynamically invoke a service.
Returns:
Object that is an instanceof interfaceClass.
